00025 #include "terse_report_test.hpp"
00026 #include <aeryn/test_funcs.hpp>
00027 #include <aeryn/terse_report.hpp>
00028 #include <aeryn/platform.hpp>

00030 namespace Aeryn
00031 {
00033         namespace
00034         {
00035                 namespace TestStrings
00036                 {
00037                         namespace MSVC
00038                         {
00040                                 const std::string terseOutput = 
00041                                         "Test Header\n" + std::string( 60, '-' ) 
00042                                         + "\n" + 
00043                                         ".FEN\n\n" + std::string( 60, '-' ) + "\n\n"
00044                                         "Test\t: Test 2\n\n"
00045                                         "myfile.cpp(100): Failure!"
00046                                         "\n" + std::string( 60, '-' ) + "\n"
00047                                         "\n"
00048                                         "Error\t: Error!\n"
00049                                         "\n" + std::string( 60, '-' ) + "\n"
00050                                         "Ran 4 tests, 1 Passed, 2 Failed, 1 Missing.\n\n";
00051                         }
00052 
00053                         namespace Other
00054                         {
00056                                 const std::string terseOutput = 
00057                                         "Test Header\n" + std::string( 60, '-' ) 
00058                                         + "\n" + 
00059                                         ".FEN\n\n" + std::string( 60, '-' ) + "\n\n"
00060                                         "Test\t: Test 2\n\n"
00061                                         "myfile.cpp:100: Failure!"
00062                                         "\n" + std::string( 60, '-' ) + "\n"
00063                                         "\n"
00064                                         "Error\t: Error!\n"
00065                                         "\n" + std::string( 60, '-' ) + "\n"
00066                                         "Ran 4 tests, 1 Passed, 2 Failed, 1 Missing.\n\n";
00067                         }
00068                 }
00069         }
00070 
00072         void TerseReportTest
00073                 ()
00074         {
00075                 std::stringstream out;
00076                 TerseReport report( out, out );
00077                 
00078                 report.BeginTesting( "Test Header\n", 3 );
00079                 report.BeginTestSet( "Test Set 1" );
00080 
00081                 report.BeginTest( "Test 1" );
00082                 report.Pass( "Test 1" );
00083                 report.EndTest( "Test 1" );
00084 
00085                 report.BeginTest( "Test 2" );
00086                 report.Failure( "Test 2", TestFailure( "Failure!", 100, "myfile.cpp" ) );
00087                 report.EndTest( "Test 2" );
00088 
00089                 report.EndTestSet( "Test Set 1" );
00090                 report.BeginTestSet( "Test Set 2" );
00091 
00092                 report.BeginTest( "" );
00093                 report.Error( "", "Error!" );
00094                 report.EndTest( "" );
00095 
00096                 report.EndTestSet( "Test Set 2" );
00097                 report.BeginTestSet( "Test Set 3" );
00098 
00099                 report.BeginTest( "Test 3" );
00100                 report.MissingTest( "Missing test", TestMissing( "Missing test!", 101, "myfile.cpp" ) );
00101                 report.EndTest( "Test 3" );
00102 
00103                 report.EndTestSet( "Test Set 3" );
00104                 report.EndTesting( 4, 2, 1 );
00105 
00106                 switch( COMPILER )
00107                 {
00108                 case MSVC:
00109                         IS_EQUAL( TestStrings::MSVC::terseOutput, out.str() );
00110                         break;
00111 
00112                 case Other:
00113                 default:
00114                         IS_EQUAL( TestStrings::Other::terseOutput, out.str() );
00115                         break;
00116                 };      
00117         }
00118         
00120 }
